item.title: Text
item.description: **vikrayād yo dhanaṃ kiṃcid gṛhṇīyāt kulasaṃnidhau |** ** krayeṇa sa viśuddhaṃ hi nyāyato labhate dhanam || 8.201 ||** yādṛśena krayeṇa svāmyaṃ bhavati taṃ darśayati | vikrīṇate ‘smin vyavahāriṇa iti vikrayaḥ āpaṇabhūmiḥ, tato yo gṛhṇīyād dhanaṃ gavādi krīyamāṇaṃ dravyaṃ mūlyaṃ vā sa labhate nyāyataḥ krayeṇa | kulasaṃnidhau viśuddham | nyāyataḥ kraya ucitena mūlyena | asaṃbhāvyapāpapuruṣākulasyānyavyavahartṛmelakakārapuruṣasamūhasya samakṣaṃ gṛhītaṃ labhate nāpahārayati | anyathā svāminā vikraye[^1] tu dravyaṃ pratinīyate[^2], kiṃ tu mūlyaṃ labhate | tasmād yas tasya vikrayī so ‘nyayataḥ[^3] krayeṇa tu daṇḍyate mūlyaṃ ca hārayati | etad uktam |
